title: BRIEF-Hosken Passenger Logistics And Rail Ltd Says Resolution Necessary For Change Of Name Has Been Passed

BRIEF-Hosken Passenger Logistics And Rail Ltd Says Resolution Necessary For Change Of Name Has Been Passed Oct 9 (Reuters) - Hosken Passenger Logistics and Rail Ltd : * HOSKEN PASSENGER LOGISTICS AND RAIL LTD - SPECIAL AND ORDINARY RESOLUTION NECESSARY FOR CHANGE OF NAME HAS BEEN PASSED BY REQUISITE MAJORITY OF VOTES
